title: HYPERFLEXIBILITY WITH NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS IN THE FOREST / DR. MARCO PARET
description:
The subject in the video didn't even know that she can be that flexible, but with non-verbal hypnosis, it is possible. Dr. Marco Paret used the technique of Fascination - the power of the gaze and the woman bent backward without any problems. This video was captured in Brazil, where Dr. Pare did one of his recent masterclasses for non-verbal hypnosis. He taught his students the ancient powerful techniques of Mesmerism and Fascination. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more free lessons and useful techniques:
